title: Hero MotoCorp launches Xtreme 160R 4V premium bike at Rs 1.27 lakh onwards
description: It comes in three variants of Standard, Connected 2.0, and Pro priced at Rs 1,27,300, Rs 1,32,800 and Rs 1,36,500, respectively (all prices ex-showroom Delhi), the company added.
